```{css echo=FALSE}
/* TODO: use https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-web/blob/54f82c6f137be7e7702e0befad24a3e7d2524bf1/docs/gallery/carousel.R#L5 */

.quarto-title-block {
    display: none;
}

.carousel-item {
    height: 100vh;
}

.carousel-item img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
}

.carousel-background {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100vh;
    z-index: -1;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.content-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    min-height: 100vh;
    text-align: center;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

.hex-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 300px;
    height: 300px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    clip-path: polygon(50% 0%, 95% 25%, 95% 75%, 50% 100%, 5% 75%, 5% 25%);
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
    padding: 20px;
}

.hex-container img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: contain;
}

.title-container {
    margin-top: 2rem;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

.title-container .custom-title {
    margin: 0 0 0 1rem;
    color: #C3212B;
}

.title-container .custom-subtitle {
    margin-top: 1rem;
    color: #00509E;
    white-space: pre-line;
}
```

```{=html}
<div class="carousel-background">
    <div id="backgroundCarousel" class="carousel slide carousel-fade" data-bs-ride="carousel" data-bs-interval="5000">
        <div class="carousel-inner">
            <div class="carousel-item active">
                <img src="res/img/carousel/NTNU.jpg" alt="NTNU campus">
            </div>
            <div class="carousel-item">
                <img src="res/img/carousel/Trondheim.jpg" alt="Trondheim">
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="content-wrapper">
    <div>
        <div class="hex-container">
            <img src="{{< meta image >}}" alt="{{< meta image-alt >}}">
        </div>
        <div class="title-container">
            <h2 class="custom-title">COAIM</h2>
            <div class="custom-subtitle">Conference On Alzheimer's disease In Midt-Norge <br> International collaborative conference</div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
```
